message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.http.converter.json.Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.http.converter.json.Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.fasterxml.jackson.core.ObjectCodec' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.http.converter.json.Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.http.converter.json.Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.http.converter.json.Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.http.converter.json.Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder'.
